title: World's Largest Pension Fund Seeks Information on Bitcoin Under Portfolio Diversification Plan
description: Japan's state pension fund, GPIF, is seeking information about bitcoin as part of a broader strategy initiated in response to significant economic and societal changes and technological advancements.

title: Bitcoin’s Slump Sees Crypto Bulls Staring at $440M in Liquidations
description: Prices could be headed to as low as $55,000 in the coming weeks, one trader said, but the long-term bullish outlook remains intact.

title: Bitcoin mining firm Bit Digital reports revenues up nearly 40%
description:
Bitcoin mining company Bit Digital said that its venture into artificial intelligence had already produced $4 million of revenue in February 2024.

Nasdaq-listed Bitcoin (BTC) mining firm Bit Digital has announced earnings of $44.9 million for 2023 — up 39% from 2022.

Bit Digital said it earned 1,507.3 BTC in 2023, which represents a 21% increase compared to 2022. The BTC amount reported by the mining firm is worth around $97 million at current market prices.

Bit Digital said this growth was driven by a “higher active hash rate” but was partially offset by increased network difficulty.

Read more

title: SEC Hit With Sanctions For Abuse Of Power In Debt Box Case
description: The Securities and Exchange Commission initially conceded it misled the court but maintained that a sanction was inappropriate. The regulator must now pay the attorneys’ fees for Debt Box.

title: Fidelity incorporates staking in the Ethereum ETF proposal
description: Financial powerhouse Fidelity has made a significant move in the cryptocurrency market, submitting an amended proposal for an Ethereum (ETH) exchange-traded fund (ETF).  The amendment introduces a staking feature to the proposed ETF, allowing investors to stake a portion of the fund’s assets through a trusted staking provider. Fidelity’s Ethereum ETF proposal echoes Bitcoin’s regulatory […]

title: KuCoin Lists Privacy-focused Crypto Project Partisia Blockchain (MPC)
description:
KuCoin, one of the most prominent crypto trading platforms globally, has endorsed the token of the Partisia Blockchain (MPC), an emerging privacy-focused crypto project. This was disclosed in a recent post on KuCoin’s official website and via its X handle, noting that MPC has been added to its list of tradable crypto assets. In the […]
